Mercura Cases

Migatronic

Mercura is proud to present our latest accomplishment: the development of an advanced CoWelder configurator for Migatronic.

Our configurator stands out due to its complexity and sophistication, featuring over 1000 constraints to ensure that every configuration meets the precise requirements and standards. Furthermore the configurator generates visually appealing and detailed quotes, significantly aiding the sales team in presenting clear and concise options to potential clients.

Read More

Lindab Garage door Configurator

We have developed a very intuitive configurator for Lindab which helps end-users and dealers visualize and concretize their solutions on garage doors. The configurator includes all the garage door variations that Lindab sells.

It includes more than 10.000 variations of the products even without taking the size into consideration.

Read More

Audi Configurator

Here you can try our latest demo project and build your own Audi Q3 both from the outside and inside. Choose between regular Q3 and Sportsback, for different equipment models, 20 different colors, 13 different rims, mirrors, lights, roof and switch between 6 camera angles.

Read More

3D Renderings for Multi-Living

As an initial phase towards delivering excellent shopping experiences to Danish kitchen consumers, Mercura has made more than 11,000 renderings and 3D models for Multi-Living.

Read More

Product configurator for Copla Playgrounds

Copla requested an online 3D configurator where customers and business partners can configure an entire Copla playground and obtain an offer for it.

Read More
